Flexible mastery, diverse automation

Dayparting rule

Schedule advertising activities at specific hours.

Status rule

Automatically pauses or activates ads based on their performance.

Whitelist rule

The system won't negate these search terms with Blacklist, Negative, e.t.c.

Bidding rule

Adjusts bids for keywords and targets to hit your ACOS target.

Placement rule

Adjusts Top of Search % or Product Page % based on performance.

Revive rule

Boosts bids for previously successful keywords with no recent traffic.

Import rule

Adds keywords or targets based on their performance.

Negative word

Adds non-performing words as negative phrase keywords to ad group.

Daily budget

Daily adjusts campaign budget based on performance and day of the week

Negative rule

Adds negatives based on search term performance to your ad group.

Blacklist rule

Add irrelevant keywords; the system automatically sets them as negative.
